latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service not free of pests or maintains pest harborage conditions at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Food service area in child care service not free of vermin and other pests Food prep area not free of pest harborage or conditions conducive to the presence of pests at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take appropriate action to keep facility free of pests or conditions conducive to pests Child care service fails to maintain extermination service log
At the time of inspection child care service was observed providing hair brushes and cloth towels for use by children
At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had age appropriate immunizations unless a child is exempt
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
